heroText: ...who likes to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences.
profileAboutMe: In my web development adventure, which I have been continuing as a freelance for more than 10 years, I have served hundreds of customers and created many websites. I have great confidence in my aesthetic sense and design eye.
profileAboutMe2: Fulfilling the desired design completely without sacrificing the perfectionist understanding of design is one of the things I enjoy most in this life.
footerText: Got a question or proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
